file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 76-11-00-06 - THRUST CONTROL SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL THRUST CONTROL SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do an inspection of the engine control harness. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ENGINE CONTROL HARNESS - INSPEC- ALL 76-11-00-200-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 76-11-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-11-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE CONTROL HARNESS - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400 NACELLE APRON - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400 APRON - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine 414 Upper Cowling LH Engine 424 Upper Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To give access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task In the engine EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 76-11-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the workstand in position in the work area. (2) Remove the related components: (a) Lower Cowling AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400. (b) Upper Cowling AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400. (c) Nacelle Apron AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400. J. Engine Control Harness - GVI SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Visually examine the engine control harness. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand from the work area.
